nossoMarSalveOsPatos.title: Nosso Mar Salve os Patinhos
nossoMarSalveOsPatos.description: Game developed independently in Unity with C#. In this project, I worked as the lead developer and project manager. The game's objective is to raise awareness about environmental pollution.

estagioPlanetEco.title: Software Development Internship - Planet Eco
estagioPlanetEco.description: I am currently working on developing microservices in Flask with Redis communication, creating REST APIs for automation and system integration. I also develop responsive web interfaces using React and TypeScript, automate data collection and processing in spreadsheets and XLSX/CSV files, and maintain desktop systems in Python. Additionally, I participate in client interactions to understand requirements and deliver technical solutions aligned with their needs.

desenvolvedorJrJavaSmit.title: Junior Java Developer - Smit
desenvolvedorJrJavaSmit.description: I work as a Junior Java Developer, contributing to the development of backend applications using Java and Spring.

restaurantePs.title: Restaurante Web
restaurantePs.description: Project for a restaurant menu management system, developed with React.js and Firebase, allowing users to view and manage the menu intuitively. The system includes features such as adding, editing, and deleting menu items, as well as a billing system after payment, and a user-friendly interface for administrators.

deckIfy.title: DeckIfy
deckIfy.description: DeckIfy is a web platform focused on automating your studies by generating Anki FlashCards using AI. Developed with React.js and Python, it is 100% open source.

chatBotAI.title: ChatBot AI
chatBotAI.description: Implementation of an intelligent chatbot in JavaScript, designed to deliver realistic and interactive conversations. It uses artificial intelligence to interpret user inputs and respond dynamically.

ankiConvertAPI.title: Anki Convert API
ankiConvertAPI.description: API that converts sets of flashcards into .apkg files compatible with Anki, facilitating the creation of study materials using spaced repetition.

processImageAPI.title: Image Processing API
processImageAPI.description: Microservice developed with Flask for asynchronous image resizing. It uses Redis for caching, RabbitMQ for messaging, and PIL for processing. The application is containerized with Docker Compose, allowing easy deployment and scalability. It has two endpoints: one for sending the image and resizing it, and another for querying the stored metadata.

authJWTAPI.title: Auth JWT API
authJWTAPI.description: Authentication microservice that uses JWT and PostgreSQL for secure and scalable login. The API is hosted on Render along with the database, allowing easy integration into modern applications.

artigoCientifico.title: Scientific Article
artigoCientifico.description: Scientific article analyzing the impact of the pandemic on Airbnb's economy, using Python for data collection, filtering, and analysis.
